businessProfile.name: Giordano's
businessProfile.address: 3619 Las Vegas Blvd S Ste 200, Las Vegas, NV 89109, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 3619 Las Vegas Blvd S Ste 200, Las Vegas, NV 89109, USA

reviews.text: Fabulous ambience, exceptional staff, fantastic food. (The cheese pull on our fresh baked Chicago pizza was extraordinary!!)  Make sure you try the Giordano‚Äôs Sampler while you wait for your piping HOT pizza. Marcella was our server and she was friendly, hardworking and extremely attentive. All the staff were busy and working so hard to make this place so amazing. Such a pleasant experience. Highly recommend!! ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

Giordano‚Äôs never disappoints! Yes, the deep dish pizza takes about 50 minutes to prepare, but trust me, it‚Äôs absolutely worth it. The crust is buttery and perfectly crisp, the cheese pull is unreal, and the sauce is rich and flavorful. You can tell it‚Äôs made fresh and with care.

The staff was upfront about the wait time and made sure we were comfortable while waiting. We ordered some appetizers and drinks to pass the time, and once the pizza arrived, it was pure perfection.

If you‚Äôre visiting, just plan for the wait and enjoy the experience this is Chicago-style deep dish done right.
Highly recommend for true pizza lovers!

We were starving and gave Giordano‚Äôs on Las Vegas Strip a try‚Äîso glad we did. Alejandra, our server, was fantastic and suggested a sangria and a chopped chicken salad to enjoy while we waited the 40‚Äì50 minutes for the pizza (totally worth it). The place was packed‚Äîeven on a Thursday, which we later heard is a slow day‚Äîbut prices were fair for the Strip. We grabbed a table on the lower outdoor area cuz there was no wait, versus about a 20 minute wait to sit inside the restaurant. The salad was fresh, the sangria solid, and the deep-dish pizza was excellent. You can tell the team works hard to keep things running smoothly. We‚Äôll definitely be back.

The food here, especially the pizza, is top notch. If you like extra cheesy, Chicago-style deep-dish pizza, or haven‚Äôt tried it yet, this is a must. Keep two things in mind when visiting here: the deep-dish pizza is very filling, and it takes a while to cook. Our waitress let us know before we started looking over the menu that the deep-dish pizzas take about 1 hour to bake. This is important to note if you‚Äôre trying to grab lunch or dinner before a concert or show. Despite being fairly busy, ours came out in about 40 minutes. We were in no hurry so it wasn‚Äôt a big deal. My friend and I shared a 10-inch Chicago  Classic with pepperoni, onions, mushrooms and green bell peppers. It was delicious and very filling. We struggled to finish our 3 slices each. I also ordered a Little Italy Ranch Salad. It, too, was delicious. Highly recommend trying this place out.

After being on a plane all day, we were looking for a restaurant near our hotel and Giordano‚Äôs was right down the street. We ordered a deep dish pizza and our server told about the 45 minute wait, which we didn‚Äôt mind after being out in the 107 degree heat. The pizza was one of the best we had ever eaten! The crust was light and flaky, loaded with tons of cheese and toppings. The one downside to this place was a photographer approached the table to take pictures to try and sell us, even to a group of photographers, it made this seem like another Vegas tourist trap, rather than a great pizza place.

editorial_summary.overview: Known for deep-dish pizza, this casual chain serves other classic Italian food, plus beer & wine.

recentReviews.text: Just OK.  We wanted a fun deep dish place and since we were at the Westin this was just an easy walk away.  Fulfilled the craving, but the pizza was kind of mid.
We love Giordano's stuffed pizza. Our server Heather was great.  Very attentive and quick.

La pizza es muy buena, los sabores son suaves y no es muy condimentada, la pizza puede tardar de 35-45 min y si te encuentras en lista de espera ser√≠a de 15-35 min m√°s, el servicio no es bueno ni en la terraza ni el restaurante de arriba, acude con tiempo al lugar.
Food and service was excellent thank you so much Alejandra for everything
A little warm in the summer but great food and atmosphere.  Beware they charge you for cups if you get a drink and don't tell you they're doing it until you get the bill.

detailedReviews.author: Animesh Hajela
detailedReviews.text: Just OK.  We wanted a fun deep dish place and since we were at the Westin this was just an easy walk away.  Fulfilled the craving, but the pizza was kind of mid.

detailedReviews.author: Robert Winke
detailedReviews.text: We love Giordano's stuffed pizza. Our server Heather was great.  Very attentive and quick.

detailedReviews.author: Aldo Jacobo
detailedReviews.text: La pizza es muy buena, los sabores son suaves y no es muy condimentada, la pizza puede tardar de 35-45 min y si te encuentras en lista de espera ser√≠a de 15-35 min m√°s, el servicio no es bueno ni en la terraza ni el restaurante de arriba, acude con tiempo al lugar.

detailedReviews.author: RoboThink CV
detailedReviews.text: Food and service was excellent thank you so much Alejandra for everything

detailedReviews.author: Nathan Fisk (The Riddler)
detailedReviews.text: A little warm in the summer but great food and atmosphere.  Beware they charge you for cups if you get a drink and don't tell you they're doing it until you get the bill.

detailedReviews.author: Swadhi Mehta
detailedReviews.text: Loved the experience!! I ordered chicken tacos and it turned out to be amazing. Great service and recommendation by the waiter.

detailedReviews.author: Tiffany H.
detailedReviews.text:
I wanted to eat upstairs to get out of the heat..but didn't end up eating upstairs..I walked in and was not greeted..but there was a lady standing there who was just staring at me and said nothing. I later realized she was the photographer. The least she could have done was smile. Her co worker came seconds later and she just pointed at her. Her coworker who took me to my table was friendly..but I later told her I'm just going to go downstairs to eat at bar instead.

The lady downstairs immediately greeted me and took me to my table. My server was Miguel and he was so friendly and fantastic. I'm so glad I made the decision to go downstairs to sit and eat. Yeah, I might be in the heat but at least the service was way better compared to no smile lady upstairs.

For my meal I got the BBQ wings, and the meat and more meat deep dish with a strawberry daiquiri. The deep dish pizza took 45min-1 hour to make but my server informed me that. No worries though I was in no rush and I could see that it was busy. My wings and deep dish pizza were delicious!!!

The service at the bar area downstairs was great!!! Thank you Miguel for being a wonderful server. When I am in Vegas again and want some good pizza I will come here.

detailedReviews.author: Brian V
detailedReviews.text: It‚Äôs not a full restaurant but the pizza is on point as always.  I‚Äôve been to Chicago and now here.  Worth it.  Make the walk over and be prepared if you are ordering by phone to wait 45 mins.    Lots to do nearby also.

detailedReviews.author: A A
detailedReviews.text:
Wait time is too long.
The taste is not good.

detailedReviews.author: Michael R Rubin
detailedReviews.text: Great Deep Dish Pizza. The Caesar Salad was very good as well.

detailedReviews.author: Garvit Hasija
detailedReviews.text: Worst service possible at any place. Server was rude and was reluctant to serve water while waiting long time for food. Don‚Äôt bother going here!

detailedReviews.author: Steve Vela
detailedReviews.text: Jose the bartender from LA had a great attitude and made us feel welcome. Although of bars in Vegas are fast paced so you don't get the personal experience. This pizza place was great!

detailedReviews.author: Shruthi Sheshadri
detailedReviews.text: This used to be a good place couple of years before. But whoever served us was so rude. We just asked to replace one veggie with another and he denied it. He was okay with removing everything but replacing was not an option and we had to create the pizza from scratch which would cost 20-30 bucks more. This was absolutely ridiculous. Being vegetarians, there was one or 2 options max and even there a minor modification was rudely denied. Wouldn't recommend unless you want to have a mediocre pizza from a rude waiter.

detailedReviews.author: Jaime Gonzalez
detailedReviews.text: Las pizzas son espectaculares y las mejores de las Vegas, tienes que esperar pero vale la pena

detailedReviews.author: Sarah Madigan
detailedReviews.text: We had delicious deep dish pizza and it was just as we remember from our younger years living in Chicago. Duane was our server and he was friendly and attentive-excellent service!

detailedReviews.author: Alex Holladay
detailedReviews.text:
Pizza is fantastic. Tastes just like the original in Chicago.

Not much of an atmosphere. Service was good though.

You‚Äôre coming here to eat pizza. Drink a beer and leave. That‚Äôs really it and it‚Äôs worth it because of how good the pizza will be.

detailedReviews.author: bhumit wadhwani
detailedReviews.text:
I generally don‚Äôt write much reviews but this place deserved it. The guy was so rude that just asking for water made him that we offended him. ‚ÄúYou have to wait for 4 minutes‚Äù probably he will remember us.
Either he should have a manners class or removed.

detailedReviews.author: Cristian Dimas
detailedReviews.text: Buen sabor la verdad buen servicio buen lugar diez de diez

detailedReviews.author: David K (Dave K)
detailedReviews.text: Went here for lunch. The server was inattentive and the pizza was soggy. Really disappointing

detailedReviews.author: Jona Cenas Wright
detailedReviews.text: First time trying Chicago style deep dish pizza and it was not disappointing. Still a fan of the new york pizza but I thoroughly enjoyed the food and taste. I got full off of two slices. It did take a little over an hour to get the pizza but the appetizer sampler did help to tide me over. The bruschetta. was a highlight for me.

detailedReviews.author: E. Miller
detailedReviews.text: If you like deep dish pizza, Giordano's makes one of the best! If in a hurry, don't purchase. A good deep dish pizza takes time. It's good that they ask if waiting is ok? It can take up to 40 mins, but imo, worth it. Other good items on the menu as well. Parking is challenging, because it's on the strip, upstairs in front of of the Horseshoe casino.

detailedReviews.author: A P
detailedReviews.text: I'm a big Giordano's fan. One of my favorite restaurants. I seek it out wherever I am. Been to several locations (Chicago, Florida, this location) and this was the most disappointing experience. Pizza was not fully hot when delivered (this should NEVER happen at any pizza joint). But the bigger issue was that the sauce was unusually over-salty. I will be back but hopefully these issues are addressed.

detailedReviews.author: Gerardo Rodr√≠¬≠guez
detailedReviews.text:
Come una pizza deep dish, c√≥mo si estuvieras en Chicago!
Realmente espectacular, la sopa minestrone y la ensalada griega tambi√©n estan muy buenas!

detailedReviews.author: Maksym Zaivyi
detailedReviews.text:

detailedReviews.author: Diane Bates
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza ever!

detailedReviews.author: Thu Pham
detailedReviews.text: Good dinner specials offered.

detailedReviews.author: Danijela Ilic
detailedReviews.text: Both husband and I are Chicago born and raised. So naturally we never miss a chance to visit Giordano‚Äôs! Love this location! Food and ambiance were great. We were blown away by our Server Jelena S as well. This young lady was so attentive, interactive and fast. Loved her smile! Will definitely be back next year for our visit!

detailedReviews.author: Clint Rockwell
detailedReviews.text: Fun and delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Jesus Guerrero Catalan
detailedReviews.text: Good mealüòã

detailedReviews.author: Shylo Bautista
detailedReviews.text: It takes an hour for a pizza. They didn't have any lettuce for salads.  The waiter didn't even check on us.

detailedReviews.author: Nataly Acosta
detailedReviews.text: La mejor pizza de Las Vegas

detailedReviews.author: Vinna Leake
detailedReviews.text: Their customer service is top-notch, making you feel valued every time.

detailedReviews.author: Pha Hanh
detailedReviews.text: I love the way they decorate the interior; it creates such a cheerful mood.

detailedReviews.author: JC
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely great bartender Jose

detailedReviews.author: Deborah Haskins
detailedReviews.text: Chop salad was great. Personal pizza not a big deal for price

detailedReviews.author: Ed Orozco
detailedReviews.text: The best deep dish pizza! Every time we are in Vegas this place is in our list of places to eat.

detailedReviews.author: Lydia Torres
detailedReviews.text: Moe was the absolute BEST!!! she is hard working and serviced the entire restaurant. Her attention to customer needs is beyond measure.  Thank you, Moe!

detailedReviews.author: Edward ‚Äú3RDegree‚Äù Williams
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was DELICIOUS!!! But $20 for 7 pieces of Wings? You can at least do 14 pieces, that would be a little more understandable.

detailedReviews.author: Estela Mart√≠nez Pe√±afiel
detailedReviews.text: Deliciosas, excelente servicio y atenci√≥n de Alejandra Ramos. Felicidades!

detailedReviews.author: Sam M.
detailedReviews.text: A bit expensive but worth it in our opinion, SOOO much cheese, amazing flavor, soooooo good!

detailedReviews.author: Kartikey Garg
detailedReviews.text: Extremely tasteless pizza

detailedReviews.author: Jagdish Patel
detailedReviews.text: I love their environment and service. Food is something that I am not fond of and everytime I eat here I feel a bit different in my tommy. It's just me so not saying it for general.

detailedReviews.author: Hart Scott
detailedReviews.text: The personal deep dish pizza was fantastic, as was the thin crust mushroom. It was a little hard to hear, but that's more me than you, Giordano. Heather, our server, nearly outshone the pizza. She was lovely and informative. Thank you!

detailedReviews.author: Pauline Hamm-Jeol
detailedReviews.text: Ordered via Uber at 12 p.m. for an estimated arrival between 1 p.m. and 1:30 p.m. After calling at 1 p.m., the order still wasn't ready, and the person on the phone was not at all helpful or pleasant. I ended up canceling the order myself at 2:40 p.m. because it still hadn't arrived.

detailedReviews.author: Attilio Castellarin
detailedReviews.text: Rather disappointed. They claim: "best pizza of the world". I tried the deep stuffed make your own one. It ended up being a pizza-flavored quiche (nothing to do with an authentic pizza) wich requires 1-hour preparation (again, nothing to do with a pizza)

detailedReviews.author: elisa conti
detailedReviews.text: Very disappointing pizza. After a 40-minute wait, it came out dry with a tomato sauce that tasted more like concentrate than fresh sauce. Totally undeserving of the name ‚Äúpizza.‚Äù

detailedReviews.author: Carlos Anzaldo
detailedReviews.text: Food it‚Äôs good but service it‚Äôs a nightmare

detailedReviews.author: Chris Hugie
detailedReviews.text: Fernando was amazing and the best The most intent of waiter we have ever had. Greatest service ever!!

detailedReviews.author: Michael Picchi
detailedReviews.text: Fernando S was so good and attentive

detailedReviews.author: Rachel Meredith
detailedReviews.text: Ordered the the Chicago Classic Thin Crust and it was absolutely disgusting. The dough was soggy and undercooked. The cheese was layered too thick. The staff cooked it a hour before the pickup time so it wasn‚Äôt fresh for pickup. The pizza was $40 and the quality isn‚Äôt worth a cent.

detailedReviews.author: Steven Starr
detailedReviews.text: First ever Giordano's experience in Vegas.  It's worth the wait for the deep dish.   Delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Alex Leo
detailedReviews.text: Jose in the bar out back was great! Super attentive and great conversationalist.

detailedReviews.author: Geraldo S
detailedReviews.text: Comida italiana tipica, local central, bem ambientado e pre√ßos razo√°veis.

detailedReviews.author: Liam BM
detailedReviews.text: The pasta bolognese I order wasn‚Äôt the best I had for for. But for the amount you get and the price you pay I have to give it 5 stars, unfortunately we didn‚Äôt get the deep dish the wait time was 45 mins and we were inpatient:)

detailedReviews.author: Mountaineer Photo Excursions
detailedReviews.text: After being on a plane all day, we were looking for a restaurant near our hotel and Giordano‚Äôs was right down the street. We ordered a deep dish pizza and our server told about the 45 minute wait, which we didn‚Äôt mind after being out in the 107 degree heat. The pizza was one of the best we had ever eaten! The crust was light and flaky, loaded with tons of cheese and toppings. The one downside to this place was a photographer approached the table to take pictures to try and sell us, even to a group of photographers, it made this seem like another Vegas tourist trap, rather than a great pizza place.

detailedReviews.author: Nora Galindo
detailedReviews.text: Food was fantastic! As was my pi√±a colada! We had a great dining experience there. Definitely recommend this place.

detailedReviews.author: Andres Guio
detailedReviews.text: We were starving and gave Giordano‚Äôs on Las Vegas Strip a try‚Äîso glad we did. Alejandra, our server, was fantastic and suggested a sangria and a chopped chicken salad to enjoy while we waited the 40‚Äì50 minutes for the pizza (totally worth it). The place was packed‚Äîeven on a Thursday, which we later heard is a slow day‚Äîbut prices were fair for the Strip. We grabbed a table on the lower outdoor area cuz there was no wait, versus about a 20 minute wait to sit inside the restaurant. The salad was fresh, the sangria solid, and the deep-dish pizza was excellent. You can tell the team works hard to keep things running smoothly. We‚Äôll definitely be back.

detailedReviews.author: R S
detailedReviews.text: My wife is from Chicago and we always look forward to finding authentic deep dish Pizza from a Chicago restaurant. The Las Vegas Giordano's disappointed us. The crust seemed uncooked in some spots and soggy. They were busy so they may have pulled the pie out early. It was an okay experience overall.

detailedReviews.author: Leonardo Monteiro
detailedReviews.text: Amazing food, deep dish pizzas are specially filling, so pay attention to recommended people served by size, indicated on menu. Staff was helpful. Also, don't take the info that the deep dish takes 40-50 min as an indicator of busy kitchen, it simply takes that long for that heavy filling. But it's so worth it!

detailedReviews.author: Maribelle Hern√°ndez
detailedReviews.text:
La pizza es muy rica, el servicio de meseros es muy atento, solo tardan mucho en traer la pizza cl√°sica de Chicago m√°s de 45 minutos espera
Pero si te lo advierten

detailedReviews.author: Kevin B.
detailedReviews.text: Ordered on 8/29. Bad experience. Ordered but said it would take a hour and half for pizza. What! The messed up my order. Lady at takeout area offrlered me a cheese pizza or I could wait longer. Did not get a savings for just a cheese pizza when I ordered mine with Sausage and Mushrooms.

detailedReviews.author: X Y
detailedReviews.text: I ate at the Giordano's located upstairs, sitting at the bar Saturday night at 8PM.  Service was good but maybe its me but the meal was just okay. Started with a house salad with the house dressing and it was super tart, almost to the point of not edible. Ordered a personal pie with sausage which had plenty of sauce and sausage under the sauce. Came out hot and in the 25 minutes as specified. The disappointment was the crust, more like crackers than bread.  Ate the pie but did not eat half the crust.  Probably would not go back.

detailedReviews.author: Stefi Mikova
detailedReviews.text: Bad food, high prices a lot of waiting and the service is awful. The only positive thing is that they are the only open place after 22:00 on the strip.

detailedReviews.author: Joshua
detailedReviews.text: Too expensive for what you get, and the server never actually checked on us - I had to call for attention every time we needed something, and sometimes drinks were forgotten. Also, when I asked for a little extra red sauce (free at most pizza places), the server didn't tell me it would cost another 5 bucks. The food was just average.  I was especially disappointed in the crust on the deep dish!  No real flavor to it!  (Texture/consistency was fine, though) At least the peppers in the pizza tasted fresh.

detailedReviews.author: Rafa Robaina
detailedReviews.text:
After waiting one hour the pizza came cold and they forgot the pasta.
The only two main dishes failed
A total disappointment

detailedReviews.author: Carolina Vargas
detailedReviews.text: Worst restaurant worst attention, they are not honest with the time of waiting, they make you wait in a line of 30 min to enter then they tell you the pizzas take 1 hour to be done so to order another thing if you are hungry lol and they are a place of pizza so !!!

detailedReviews.author: juan roldan
detailedReviews.text: La pizza muy buena pero por ser super esponjose se tarda aprox 1 hora

detailedReviews.author: Eric Trentz
detailedReviews.text: Marcela was awesome. Great atmosphere and even better food

detailedReviews.author: Benji
detailedReviews.text: The food here is absolutely amazing. I had Mama‚Äôs Meatball Sub with the soup. And this combo compliments each other perfectly. The soup was so tasty and the sub as well. The only complaint I have is that it took quite a long time for the food to come. Maybe around 20-30 minutes. But besides that it‚Äôs a great restaurant!

detailedReviews.author: Rosy Nails
detailedReviews.text: Locale molto ampio e il menu pur non essendo una pizza alla napoletana  comunque √®  buona e chicca del.locale √®  il servizio  di acqua  fredda che continuamente danno ed √®  gratis personale  gentile lo consiglio vivamente

detailedReviews.author: Jesus Carrillo
detailedReviews.text: Las pizzas son buenas, pero la espera es demasiado. por una pizza individual espere casi 50min

detailedReviews.author: Jeremy Hinds
detailedReviews.text: Food was great! Order an appetizer and a cocktail, the pizza is deep dish so it takes a while to cook.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers have positive experiences overall. Your 4.0/5 rating from 100 recent reviews shows solid satisfaction with room for growth.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the deliciousness and authenticity of the deep dish pizza, reminiscent of the original in Chicago. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The attentive and friendly service provided by staff members like Heather, Alejandra, and Miguel enhances the dining experience. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The restaurant's atmosphere, despite being warm at times, is appreciated for its welcoming vibe, especially in the bar area. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Long wait times and poor service - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews and reputation issues due to rude service and food quality concerns (e.g., oversalted pizza, soggy pizza) - review management can address this concern
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness - social media marketing can improve this area

positive.author: Animesh Hajela
positive.text: Just OK.  We wanted a fun deep dish place and since we were at the Westin this was just an easy walk away.  Fulfilled the craving, but the pizza was kind of mid.

neutral.author: A P
neutral.text: I'm a big Giordano's fan. One of my favorite restaurants. I seek it out wherever I am. Been to several locations (Chicago, Florida, this location) and this was the most disappointing experience. Pizza was not fully hot when delivered (this should NEVER happen at any pizza joint). But the bigger issue was that the sauce was unusually over-salty. I will be back but hopefully these issues are addressed.

negative.author: A A
negative.text:
Wait time is too long.
The taste is not good.

negative.author: Garvit Hasija
negative.text: Worst service possible at any place. Server was rude and was reluctant to serve water while waiting long time for food. Don‚Äôt bother going here!

negative.author: Shruthi Sheshadri
negative.text: This used to be a good place couple of years before. But whoever served us was so rude. We just asked to replace one veggie with another and he denied it. He was okay with removing everything but replacing was not an option and we had to create the pizza from scratch which would cost 20-30 bucks more. This was absolutely ridiculous. Being vegetarians, there was one or 2 options max and even there a minor modification was rudely denied. Wouldn't recommend unless you want to have a mediocre pizza from a rude waiter.

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
